title: Dr. Slump: Arale-chan
alternative_title: Dr. Slump & Arale-chan, Dr. Slump 1, Dr.スランプ・アラレちゃん
description: Dr. Slump creates a little android girl, Arale, who is very stong, happy, and totally common senseless. They live in Penguin Village where the strangest things happen (e.g., the dawn is announced by a little pig wearing a basquee).
genre: [<Genre -> Comedy>, <Genre -> Sci-Fi>, <Genre -> Shounen>, <Genre -> Slice of Life>]
